Documentation Site Setup Steps

Aug 27, 2018 â€¢ dwatkins

This is a static site built with Jekyll using the Jekyll Doc Theme by aksakalli.

Setup details below

Jekyll Setup

Installation Instructions

Quick Start Instructions

Theme Setup

  1. Download the repo into docs folder (assuming gh-pages is set up to build from docs folder)

  2. Open and modify _config.yml to replace the base url and github url with actual ones

  3. commmit and push, example site should now be hosted

  4. Modify as needed

Serve Locally

#in repo
cd docs
bundle update
bundle exec jekyll serve
#navigate in browser to the server address specified on the command line to view
